additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: - Oat Milk extract: Softness and scalp protection - Rice and corn starches: highly absorbent, activity vectors, facilitate product elimination when brushed - Natural microspheres: strong degreasing power - Silica: highly absorbent - Mineral pigments: natural looking finish

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Extremely flammable aerosol. Pressurised container. May burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50 degrees Celsius / 122 degrees Fahrenheit.

description: Klorane Oat Milk Tinted Dry Shampoo
name: Oat Milk Tinted Dry Shampoo
